DOC.brief_summary: Background : Preoperative pathologic diagnosis subepithelial tumor ( SET ) improve clinical decision making . Although EUS-guided fine needle aspiration ( FNA ) currently consider standard method sampling SET , diagnostic yield generally suboptimal . EUS-guided fine needle biopsy ( FNB ) SET safe feasible adequate histology obtain . Objective : To compare diagnostic accuracy EUS-FNA EUS-FNB .
DOC.brief_title: EUS-guided Fine Needle Aspiration ( EUS-FNA ) Versus EUS-guided Fine Needle Biopsy ( EUS-FNB ) Diagnosis Subepithelial Tumors
DOC.criteria: Esophageal , gastric , duodenal SET 2 cm Hypoechoic lesion include 4th layer EUS SET characteristic finding lipoma , vessel , ectopic pancreas bleed rupture SET platelet count < 50,000 prothrombin time INR > 1.3
